attributes.title: Almost went BLIND
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my eyes buried from this app and I had to go to the doctor I could have went blind of how horrible it is I open the app and see a big fat Cheeto puff with an American flag in the background ugh don’t download this app it’s disgusting almost went blind...

attributes.title: Poor
attributes.review: The app kept shutting down after trying to open it. It caused my phone to turn off and I was not able to restart it for a couple of hours. There are clearly better apps on this App Store. Don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: Bad overall 🤮
attributes.review: I got this app hoping to understand why our president does the things he does 🥰 but it only made my phone lag and it wouldn’t allow me to play my favorite Kanye bops 😔 PLUS it sent messages to everyone I know telling them I got the Trump app😬 Now my family disowned me uwu THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE 😡

attributes.title: The Worst of the worst of all apps
attributes.review: This boy is soNarcissistic & Selfish..how could the American people ever vote for a clown like this & Download this trash app. All he cares about is America staying only white & him staying in power..Please America lets get this right come November please! Our kids & family & our lives depend on it.

attributes.title: personal info stolen, take over
attributes.review: i think that one review is right ive been recovering an astonishing number of telemarketer calls. most of which have been in chinese with the same thing repeating over and over again but i don’t know what it’s saying. i feel like since then i’ve also seen an increased number trump supporters in my area which, support who you want but it’s really weird walking around town being surrounded by dusty orange powered faces, hamsters passing as toupees and nazi symbolism in windows.

attributes.title: GEN Z
attributes.review:
Gen z is the most powerful generation this world has ever seen and of Donald Trump thinks that he can come and take tiktok from use well this is war 

If you are from tiktok like this review and make it the most liked so we can prove that Gen z is the most powerful to generation this world has ever seen~👁👄👁 ~ Anonymous

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever used
attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. while using the app, i can head a high pitch ringing. it also crashes every 5-15 minutes and forces me to restart my phone. if i could give the app 0 stars i would. 0/10 would not recommend. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: This has left me petrified
attributes.review: After downloading this app because i love my orange president. It started glitching and playing the national anthem. Even when i left the app and closed completely 😪. I have had countless nightmares because of this and i do indeed intend to have my attorneys in contact.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. I can’t even believe its still on the App Store. Apple should do some investigating and remove this app from its store. Lots of racists and homophobic comments come from here. I’m sure Apple wouldn’t want that negative energy being shared on one of their platforms.  Surly not.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this is a HORRIBLE app out so called “president” donald trump is anti- muslim, homophobic, transphobic, and anti-woman.  he wants to get rid of things like abortion and even though i personally would never get one, he should not have control over other women’s body’s.  it’s their body it should be their choice.
